https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/A6dCglAz4hwIP6ZaBFX228lQqSO.jpg In 2006 Mexico declared war on drug trafficking and since then, violence spread like wildfire throughout the country. Until today more than 120,000 people have died violently and thousands were forced into exile, kidnapped or disappeared. Before We Are Forgotten
